How do I run a .sh within the gnome GUI?: try starting nautilus-file-managemt-properties , go to tab behaviour, there you can control, if executable tex files shoul be viewed only, always run or if a queston should pop up
maybe you have type in a terminal "chmod a+x filename"  or make a desktop-starter by right clicking on the deskop -> create starter (or so), select the file and check at "run in terminal"
